Description: Diademed head of Alexander the Great with horn of Zeus Ammon and long hair right; border of dots. (obverse)
Eagle standing on thunderbolt with wings open, left. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Kingdom of Egypt Ancient Greece and Rome: Kingdom of Egypt
Bibliographic references: Svoronos 1904 / Τα Νομισματα του Κρατους των Πτολεμαιων (The Coins of the Ptolemaic Kings) (239) (type)
SNG Copenhagen / Sylloge Nummorum Graecorum: The Royal Collection of coins and medals, Danish National Museum (43 vols) (59) (type)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Ptolemy I Soter I
